function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased energy consumption due to COVID-19 confinement","Impact":"Higher energy bills, strain on energy resources","Mitigation":"Promoting energy-saving features, smart meter installations","Technologies":"Smart meter installations, smart energy management systems, energy-saving devices","People":"Homeowners, energy consumers","Owner":"Energy suppliers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increased time spent at home leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, sanitation, and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Smart home sensors for air quality monitoring, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Smart home residents","Owner":"Smart home technology companies, homeowners, health authorities"},{"Description":"New modes of 'x from home' (xFH) leading to increased reliance on home technology","Impact":"Greater dependence on home technology for work, education, and healthcare","Mitigation":"Ensuring data privacy, cybersecurity, and reliable connectivity","Technologies":"Secure remote access tools, encrypted communication platforms","People":"Remote workers, students, healthcare seekers","Owner":"Technology companies, educators, healthcare providers"}]}
